title: T-000: docs: Create Architecture Decision Records (ADRs)
body: Establish the /docs/adr directory and create initial records for key decisions: 1. Clean Architecture structure, 2. Use of yt-dlp with Node.js, 3. Sparse file storage strategy.

title: T-001: chore(setup): Initialize Repo, Tooling & Makefile
body: Configure pyproject.toml (uv, ruff, mypy, pytest), create Hexagonal folder structure, and the Makefile to standardize commands (install, test, lint).

title: T-002: ci(github): Configure Strict Quality Pipeline
body: Create GitHub Actions workflow (.github/workflows/quality.yml). Must execute Linter, Type Checker, and Unit Tests. Pipeline must fail on errors.

title: T-003: feat(config): Implement Centralized Settings
body: Implement app/config/settings.py using pydantic-settings. Support .env loading and LOCAL/CLOUD context switching.

title: T-004: feat(core): Define Domain Entities & Ports
body: Create dataclasses (VideoMetadata, DownloadJob) and Abstract Protocols (IExtractor, IDownloader, IStorage). Add Pydantic validation for Inputs.

title: T-005: feat(core): Implement Global Error Handling
body: Define domain exception hierarchy (VideoNotFoundError, StorageQuotaExceeded) to decouple infrastructure errors from business logic.

title: T-006: feat(core): Implement Download Orchestration Logic
body: Create DownloadVideoUseCase. Pure logic: Get Info -> Calculate Segments -> Reserve Space -> Orchestrate Parallel Download. Mock dependencies for testing.

title: T-007: feat(core): Implement Progress Tracking Aggregator
body: Logic to aggregate progress from N concurrent segments and calculate speed (MB/s) and ETA in real-time.

title: T-008: feat(infra): Implement yt-dlp Extractor Adapter
body: Implement IExtractor using yt-dlp. MUST use 'js_runtimes': ['node'] and run in ThreadPoolExecutor to avoid blocking asyncio loop.

title: T-009: feat(infra): Implement Local Sparse File Storage
body: Implement IStorage with aiofiles. Must pre-allocate file size (sparse technique) and allow thread-safe random access writes.

title: T-010: feat(infra): Implement Aiohttp High-Perf Downloader
body: Implement IDownloader using aiohttp. Handle ClientSession, Range Headers, Timeouts, and Exponential Backoff for retries.

title: T-011: feat(cli): Build CLI App with Typer & Rich
body: Configure cli.py. Inject local infrastructure adapters. Render live progress table using Rich library.

title: T-012: feat(api): Setup FastAPI & Dependency Injection
body: Configure main.py and dependencies.py. Implement conditional injection logic (LOCAL vs CLOUD) based on env vars.

title: T-013: feat(api): Implement Download & Status Endpoints
body: Create POST /tasks and GET /tasks/{id}. Validate DTOs with Pydantic. Return 202 Accepted.

title: T-014: feat(observability): Implement Structured Logging
body: Configure structlog. Replace print statements with structured JSON logs containing context (Trace IDs).

title: T-015: chore(docker): Create Optimized Dockerfile
body: Create multi-stage Dockerfile. Ensure Node.js is installed for runtime requirements (yt-dlp dependency).
